trends: There have been no other sightings in Box Elder
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: it was a flashing disc staying in one place for at least 7 minutes
divs: Sighting Detailsok i was at my computer until i received a call from my brother who was on his way home, and then he had told me to go outside to see a light his wife and my other brother were seeing, so I went outside and seen a bright light stay motionless then my mother and nephew came out and saw the same thing I was seeing so i ran back inside to grab my binoculars so i can catch a better look, as i returned back outside i looked and saw a disc shaped object that looked as if it were spinning and it had multiple colored lights surrounding it, and then there were 2 to 3 jets pursuing it, it then started slowly moving west, so we took a drive and tried to see if we can see it better, we parked and watched as the jets gave up and turned around, and we watch for almost 3 minutes until it faded out, were we excited to see this as it happens often, and that's all i have for now until we make another sighting.
